body: Prospect Lefferts Gardens 12th Annual House Tour, Church of the Evangel, Bedford Avenue and Hawthorne Street, Brooklyn. This year's tour, to be held Sunday, focuses on an outlying area of this designated New York City historic district. Turn-of-the-century brownstone, limestone, brick and frame houses from Rutland Road south to Clarkson Avenue will
title: CALENDAR OF EVENTS: BROOKLYN HOUSE TOUR
